okay, open up alsamixer in the terminal and make sure nothing is muted or turned down.  right, left arrows change which of the options you are controlling.  pressing F5 will give you all of the options both input and output.  Pressing m will toggle mute
and up, down arrows control the volume

I tested it with headphones and it works
give output of the following here, it should be one line: cat /etc/modprobe.d/alsa-base | grep snd-hda-intel
